case.title: I want a good decent man - 27 (United kindgom)
case.text:
Hi guys,
Am a single pretty black lady looking to have a long term good relationship with a decent hardworking white or black guy over 30. Being single sucks and because of my busy life I don't get enough time to socialise and meet people . If you are looking to have a long term relationship with the intention of settling down having kids living together etc get in touch . You won't be disappointed if you meet me as I am a lovely nice kind lady. Please reply with your pics and you will get mine . Only people living in the uk only please . No spamming . Thanks
